text: The Golden Year may refer to: * The Golden Year (album), the sole album by the group Ou Est le Swimming Pool * The Golden Year (BBC TV play), a musical comedy of 1951 starring Jack Hulbert * The Golden Year (2016 film), a film by Salvador Paskowitz * The Golden Year, a poem by Alfred, Lord Tennyson ==See also== *Golden Years (disambiguation)
title: The Golden Year
